1614880.name: Space Transport Tycoon
1614880.description:
Someone's junk is another one's treasure. And with these treasure's the robots on your home world have developed into a fast-paced cyberpunk/ sci-fi society. To keep it growing and take them to the next level, interstellar commerce is needed. That's where you come in with your startup transportation company. Transport/ trade, build and combat your way to become the legendary Tycoon Tai-pan.



What will they want, need and think of next? There's plenty to do at home, it's time to take control and decide the future. You get to build/ own the businesses, infrastructure and much more. Takeover factories, ship at half the cost and make twice the profit!



Get the job done by designing & building spaceships to deliver your cargo across the galaxy! Bring back the luxury liners, explore the cosmos in style and maybe even find the lost planet of E-den.



As your galactic empire and fame grow, so do the risks! Competitors/ space pirates would love to get their hands on the lucrative cargo and will attack your shipping lanes. Well they'll be in for a surprise or two? You and your captains command cruisers, ready to defend and win any battle! At least it's what you read in the brochure that came with the ship.

Features:

  • Develop a successful transport/ trading company.
  • Galactic stock exchange, with over 65 items being traded.
  • Logarithmic algorithms to mimic a real world economy.
  • Design & build spaceships.
  • Collect junk & turn it into treasure, bring back what once was like the luxury liners or upgrade it to something better.
  • Take care of the needs/ wants of your home world, decide their future and achieve the legendary Tycoon Tai-pan repute.
  • Tinker around & discover new technology.
  • Uncover the stories & secrets of the life-forms you meet.
  • Own businesses like restaurants, factories or night clubs.
  • Use diplomacy or combat.
  • Explore a huge galaxy with over 500 solar systems.
  • Procedurally generated, never play the same game.
  • Develop transport routes across the galaxy.
  • Hire captains to run your fleet.
1614880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
